page.title: 14Recreation around Harberton
page.content: For many people, particularly the older members of the community, recreation has to be home based, centered around the television and the garden. There is a social club with a bar and billiards table with the only meeting room in the village above it. Here the Youth Club, W.I., adult education classes and ballet classes meet and it is here that all the village social events are held. Other recreational activities are many and varied and those people involved often travel outside the area to pursue their interests, including sports. The public house although an attractive old building in the heart of the village is not greatly used by the locals.
